q: It's Michael Vick 's first trip to Hawaii as an Eagle, yet more importantly, it's the first since he was sentenced to prison for his role financing a dogfighting operation four years ago. This one feels great due to the fact that I've been through so much, Michael Vick said yesterday after the NFC's first practice of the week.`` To be able to get back to this position is paramount to me, and I'm just thankful.'' The first is that Apple is developing accessories that could enable new iPads and iPhones to communicate using NFC( near-field communications) technology. iLounge reported: In the most basic implementation, an accessory could announce its presence and potential functions to an iPad or iPhone without the need for a Bluetooth or similar connection; our source suggests that an otherwise simple case could include a radio chip so that an inserted iPhone or iPad could go into power-saving hibernation mode automatically. More complex accessories will go far beyond that.
